definition: to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]

sentences.english: Use a syringe device to gently direct water against the wall of the ear canal.
sentences.chinese: 使用注射器直接向耳孔壁注水。

sentences.english: If necessary, suction off the droplets using an eyedropper or syringe.
sentences.chinese: 如有需要，用眼藥水瓶或注射器吸取液滴。

sentences.english: He put some of his sperm in a syringe and gave it to Piper.
sentences.chinese: 他把自己的精子射在一支注射器裏交給Piper。

sentences.english: One of the charming little Loves is already fairly spitted.
sentences.chinese: 在那些嬌小可愛的愛神中，已有一個被注射器扎通了。

sentences.english: Through an interpreter, Craig asked her where the needles came from.
sentences.chinese: 通過一名翻譯，魁格問她注射器從哪裏弄到的。

sentences.english: She turned to fill the syringe from the vial of clear liquid.
sentences.chinese: 她轉過身，把玻璃小瓶裏的液體注入了注射器。

sentences.english: The power head can ensure that the air-pressure type needleless injector can be stored for a long term.
sentences.chinese: 這種動力頭能使氣壓式無針注射器長期儲放。

sentences.english: Kurt lowered the panel of the infuser and stepped back to Holly's side.
sentences.chinese: 科特放下了注射器的面板，走回霍莉身邊。

sentences.english: Today, I tried to get over my childhood phobia of syringes by donating blood.
sentences.chinese: 今天我去獻血，想解決一下我對注射器的童年陰影。

sentences.english: Objective: to know the effective time period of injectors after unsealing.
sentences.chinese: 明確注射器啓封后的有效使用時間。

sentences.english: The contrast medium is the pathological change spot which pours into through the high-pressured injector.
sentences.chinese: 造影劑是通過高壓注射器注入的病變部位的。

sentences.english: She grabs a syringe from her tray and stabs him in the arm.
sentences.chinese: 她從托盤裏拿出一個注射器刺入他的手臂上。

sentences.english: O-rings, screws, cleaning equipment, syringes, suitcase, manual.
sentences.chinese: 型環，螺絲，清洗設備，注射器，箱子，操作手冊。

sentences.english: The outer barrel of the syringe should be transparent enough; bench line can be seen distinctly.
sentences.chinese: 注射器外套應有足夠透明度，能清晰地看到基準線。

sentences.english: If giving less than 5 ml of liquids, prepare medication in a sterile syringe without a needle.
sentences.chinese: 如所給藥液少於5毫升，備藥時可使用無針頭注射器。

sentences.english: Constant air pressure is applied to a syringe of material, forcing the material down a material feed tube.
sentences.chinese: 定風施加壓力注射器的材料，迫使向下一送料管材料。

definition: see 注射針|注射针[zhu4 she4 zhen1]
fluid loaded into a syringe for a hypodermic injection
